meanings.sent1: She walked into the party with an unabashed smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: He was unabashed in admitting his mistake and apologized immediately.
meanings.sent3: The unabashed laughter of the children filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her unabashed confidence shone through in every presentation she gave.
meanings.sent5: The unabashed honesty of his words left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.sent1: The book lay on the table unabashed, waiting to be read.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the garden was unabashed, open for all to see.
meanings.sent3: The unabashed sunlight streamed through the window, brightening the room.
meanings.sent4: His unabashed excitement about the surprise party was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The unabashed truth of the matter was finally revealed, clearing all doubts.
